mapper.select: select a.Id, b.CName as 'UpdateUserName',convert(varchar(100),a.UpdateDate,20) as 'UpdateDate',a.Remark, b.ContactName,b.ContactTel,b.Place from Examine a left join Apply b on a.ApplyId = b.Id where a.ExamineType = '2' ORDER by a.UpdateDate desc
